channel.title: Help me!
channel.description: every time i download a client, i open run.bat and a box flashes then nothing. if there is a compiler, i click it then it says path not specified. i have downloaded java 6 update 13 like 10 times and it still doesn't work. plz help me :mad:

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @OmgARanger OmgARanger
item.description:
@OmgARanger wrote:

Lol, uhh, if it flashes, ever heard about extracting?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Note: Frame_Sub1.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -X1int:deprecation for details.

That means it compiled successfully. Make sure your class path variables are also set.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

the sizzler7:

well every client i download, i first click run.bat then a black box flashes up and nothing happens. so i figured compiling would fix that, but i cant compile either :mad: :mad: :mad: help!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2009, 01:21:09 pm[/size][hr]well, now i can compile, but run.bat still doesn’t work :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

Somthing is wrong with your Java then because it shouden’t just fash up then does nothing. Also it might be because you haven’t got the correct JDK loaded onto your computer
Also the recomended JDK is update 12 because update 13 was just fuked up lol

Read full topic

Note: Frame_Sub1.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -X1int:deprecation for details.
that’s exactly wat it says…plz help
srry for spam name. and thx for helping me ;D

Get a different client, or dont compile[/quote]
